editnotify-desc: Extension for page creation or editing notification
editnotify-welcome: Welcome to the special page of EditNotify.
editnotify-primary-message-namespace: A page was edited in namepace
editnotify-primary-message-category: A page was edited in category
editnotify-primary-message-template-valu: Template value was changed to a specific value

editnotify-email-body-allpages:
An edit was done in $1. 
 You are getting this notification because you are watching for this activity in the all pages.
editnotify-email-body-namespace:
An edit was done in page $1. 
 You are getting this notification because you are watching for this activity in the namespace $2.
editnotify-email-body-category:
An edit was done in page $1. 
 You are getting this notification because you are watching for this activity in the category $2.
editnotify-email-body-template-allpages:
Value of $1 was changed from $2 to $3 in Template:$4 in page $5. 
 You are getting this notification because you are watching for this activity in all pages.
editnotify-email-body-template-namespace:
Value of $1 was changed from $2 to $3 in Template:$4 in page $5. 
 You are getting this notification because you are watching for this activity in namespace $6.

 You are getting this notification because you are watching for this activity in $6.
editnotify-email-body-template-value-all:

 You are getting this notification because you are watching for this activity in all pages.

Value of $1 was changed from $2 to $3 in Template:$4 in page $5. 
 You are getting this notification because you are watching for this activity in namespace $6.

 You are getting this notification because you are watching for this activity in $6.
